statements.select: select a.DeviceId,a.DeviceCode,a.DeviceName,a.DeviceType,a.Monitor,c.DeviceStatus,c.CheckInTime,GETDATE() as LastUpdateOn from Pub_Device a inner join (select ItemId from Sys_DictionaryItemExtend where DictionaryId='00010' and ExtendCol='MonitorFlag' and V00003 = 1) b on a.DeviceType=b.ItemId left join (select x.DeviceId,x.DeviceStatus,x.CheckInTime from Log_DeviceReport x inner join (select DeviceId,MAX(CheckInTime) as CheckInTime from Log_DeviceReport Group By DeviceId)y on x.DeviceId = y.DeviceId and x.CheckInTime = y.CheckInTime where DateDiff(s,x.CheckInTime,GETDATE())<= (select case when COUNT(1) = 1 then SUM(cast(ParameterValue as int)) else 60 end as DeviceReportInterval from Sys_Parameter where ParameterId='Log_DeviceReportInterval') ) c on a.DeviceId=c.DeviceId where a.Status=1 and a.ActiveFlag=1 and a.Monitor=#Monitor# order by a.DeviceCode
